message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.CV. 

The paper discusses a new approach to machine translation using neural machine translation (NMT) and statistical machine translation (SMT) and proposes a neural system combination framework. This topic falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP) and specifically machine translation, which is covered by cs.CL. Additionally, the paper uses neural networks, which is covered by cs.NE, and artificial intelligence, which is covered by cs.AI. The paper also involves extensive experiments and evaluation, which is covered by cs.LG. Finally, the paper deals with language processing, which is also covered by cs.CV.
